```{python}
import pandas as pd
from IPython.display import HTML

temperature = list(range(0, 101))
filename = [f"au_{t}K.txt" for t in temperature]
link = [f'<a href="{f}">{f}</a>' for f in filename]

df = pd.DataFrame({
    'Temperature (in Î”T above 298 K)': temperature,
    'Download File': link
})

html = df.to_html(escape=False, index=False, classes='table table-striped')
HTML(f"""
<style>
.table {{ width: 400px; }}
.table-striped tbody tr:nth-of-type(odd) {{ background-color: #F6F5F3; }}
</style>
<h4><strong>Temperature dependent<br>refractive index data for gold</strong></h4>
{html}
""")
```
